DOC.brief_summary: The researchers will study the application of a commercial pulsed magnetic stimulating device to the feet of patients with moderate-severe foot pain secondary to diabetic peripheral neuropathy (DPN).
DOC.brief_title: Bi-Axial Rotating Magnetic Field Therapy in Refractory Neuropathic Foot Pain Secondary to Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathy
DOC.criteria: DPN stage 2 and 3; symptomatic > 6 months Pacemaker in patient or mate
